dt: {bc}an artistic composition made of various materials (such as paper, cloth, or wood) glued on a surface

dt.t: cut pictures from magazines to make a {wi}collage{/wi}

dt: {bc}a creative work that resembles such a composition in incorporating various materials or elements

dt.t: the album is a {wi}collage{/wi} of several musical styles
an artist known for her use of {wi}collage{/wi}

dt: {bc}a work (such as a film) having disparate scenes in rapid succession without transitions

et: French, literally, gluing, from {it}coller{/it} to glue, from {it}colle{/it} glue, from Vulgar Latin {it}*colla{/it}, from Greek {it}kolla{/it}
shortdef: an artistic composition made of various materials (such as paper, cloth, or wood) glued on a surface
a creative work that resembles such a composition in incorporating various materials or elements
